title: Discovered a new in game bug with unsealed spell book
body:
Hi Summoners

So just recently i have found myself discovering this bug with Unsealed Spell book which allows you to swap summoners in game, i was going as a mid laner but discovered that my jungler forgot to take smite so i gave him my mid and went jungle instead, upon switching my exhaust to smite there was no issue, i could use the spell fine, however upon backing after taking red buff i discovered that the shop doesn't allow you to buy jungle items at all even with the presence of smite as one of your main spells! please bump this or have a work around for it.

replies.body: You have to start with smite, not just have it, to be able to buy jungle items.
